趭字的基本解释

趭
jiào
奔跑：“腾而狂趭。”

趭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》子肖切，去笑，精。］
［《廣韻》才笑切，去笑，從。］
［《廣韻》弋照切，去笑，以。］
(1)奔跑。
(2)跳跃。

趭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趭； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1220第20
【廣韻】弋照切，音燿。【博雅】奔也。【玉篇】走貌。【前漢·司馬相如傳】騰而狂趭。【註】奔走也。【揚雄·河東賦】神騰鬼趭。【註】走也。　又【廣韻】才肖切，音噍。又子肖切，音醮。義?同。

趭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
趭字的起名意思

暂无。

趭
Basic explanation of words
趭
jiào
Run: "Teng and mad."
趭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" Zi Xiaoqie, laugh, fine. ]
["Guangyun" only laughed and cut, laughed, and followed. ]
["Guangyun" Yi according to the cut, to laugh, to. ]
(1) Run.
(2) Jump.
趭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Zhu Zi Department] 　趭; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1220 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Yi according to cut, sound shining. [Bo Ya] Ben Ye. [Jade articles] Take a look. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Teng and mad. [Note] It's also running around. 【Yang Xiong·Hedong Fu】Shen Teng Gui Jian. [Note] Go also.　[Guangyun] Only Xiaoqie, sound 噍. Youzi Xiaoqie, sound glutinous. Righteous? Same.
